content: cabled neckwarmer with moss stitch edges twisted ropes and central braid panel ******************************************************** 10/11/2020 please note that there was an error in the stitch sequence in row 2 of the buttonhole for the braveheart neckwarmer - the pattern read k1 knit into first yarn over drop second yarn over but it should have read knit into first yarn over drop second yarn over k1 please accept my apologies for this error this has been my first time of writing a pattern and i only did so by request i have now uploaded an amended pdf ********************************************************
